errors.rate-limit: Too many attempts, please try again later

recover.title: Forgot Password
recover.message: Enter your email address that you used to sign up. We’ll send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
recover.error: Please enter a valid email address

recover_success.title: Check your inbox
recover_success.description: If the email address is registered with ZenMate VPN, you should receive your password reset link there.

smart_location.title: Smart Location
smart_location.state_description: Customize how ZenMate connects to your favorite websites by automatically switching locations when you visit them!
smart_location.error_existing: You already added this website to your Whitelist. The same website can't be on both your Smart Location list and the Whitelist. Remove it from one of them to continue.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.tracking_description: Protect your privacy by blocking third party services from tracking online activity.
privacy.malware_description: Enable blocking of malicious sites and code snippets before they can reach your browser.
privacy.webrtc_description: WebRTC Protect will ensure that your IP address is never revealed online.

whitelist.title: Whitelist
whitelist.state_description: Want to never connect to ZenMate when browsing a specific website? Just add it to the whitelist and the VPN will automatically switch off when you visit your favorite website.
whitelist.error_existing: You already added this website to your Smart Location list. The same website can't be on both your Smart Location list and the Whitelist. Remove it from one of them to continue.

stealth-connection.title: Stealth Connection
stealth-connection.state_description: Stealth Connection removes your cookies, clears your browsing history & cache. Once you disconnect the VPN, Stealth Connection erases every trace of your online browsing activity from when you first connected to ZenMate.
stealth-connection.error_existing: You already added this website to your Smart Location list. The same website can't be on both your Smart Location list and the Whitelist. Remove it from one of them to continue.

marketing_banner.home1: Protect all your devices – Download our

smart_location.text: Customize how ZenMate connects to your favorite websites by automatically switching locations when visiting them.

whitelist.text: Want to never connect to ZenMate when browsing a specific website? Just add it to the whitelist and the VPN will automatically switch off when you visit your favorite website.

streaming.text: Binge-watch all the movies and TV shows you want, even if they're not available in your country.

stealth-connection.text: Automatically erase every trace of your browsing session with the ZenMate Stealth Connection feature, available for ZenMate Pro and Ultimate users.

campaign.heading:
Discover with
ZenMate Ultimate
campaign.subCta: For only $2.22/month for a limited time

queue.heading:

servers are busy now
queue.heading2:

queue.upgrade:

popup_validation.heading: Erase all my steps
popup_validation.paragraph:
Stealth Connection feature is turned on. Do you want to completely erase all your tracks from this session?
(removes your cookies, clears your browsing history & cache)
popup_validation.no_ask: Don’t ask again & remember my settings

rateus.heading: Enjoy our extension?
rateus.description: Click the stars to share your feedback

proxy-warning.heading: Proxy warning!
proxy-warning.description: Another browser extension is controlling your proxy settings, preventing ZenMate from working. Please disable any conflicting extension.

error_screen.title: Unfortunately the service is not available in your area
error_screen.content: Let us know that you’d like ZenMate to be available in your area by filling out a customer support request

notifications.logout: You have been automatically logged out!
